ygData.subject: In Development
ygData.msgSnippet: From Verant [quote] Dungeon Touchups/Revamps: We have plans for some updates and/or revamps for some of the dungeons in the world. Our last patch included an
ygData.messageBody:
From Verant
[quote]
Dungeon Touchups/Revamps: We have plans for some updates and/or revamps for
some of the dungeons in the world. Our last patch included an updated
Runnyeye complete with new monsters and treasures to be plundered. Next on
the list is Permafrost Keep. Lady Vox has been in the mood to do some
redecorating of her lair, which includes replacing some of her more
lackwitted minions. Stay tuned for more specific information as it is
released.
[/quote]

Would be nice if they made it hard enough to be properly tuned to remove the
level cap; yet in range with the capabilities of the majority of players'
guilds/alliances to take on. (Some may argue with me - but Gorenaire IMHO
is too difficult for the majority of the players to have ANY chance to go
after)

Slyde
